name: Schilperoortstraat
description: Hello everyone! From December/January on, a room will be free in our luminous, clean and well kept shared apartment in Old-Charlois. The price of the room is 505 including electricity, water, internet, tv and municipal taxes. You will have a direct contract (1 year minimum) with the landlord. The apartment is in a relatively quiet street in Charlois, a neighborhood in the south of Rotterdam. The Maastunnel is only 800 meters away and from here it's easy to go to the center, the station is approximately 20 minutes cycling.The apartment is situated close to the Maastunnel and consists of 2 floors. Downstairs there is a bedroom and a communal living room, kitchen and a balcony with great morning light. Upstairs there are two bedrooms and a bathroom. The room that will be available is on the first floor, is around 18 square meters. It is a spacious room with a lovely evening light that will require your furnishment and decoration. You will share the house with Dorien (28) and Karolien (32). Dorien is doing her PhD in public health at Erasmus University, works at a community garden and is active with social movements. Karolien works at the Wereldmuseum as a provenance researcher and enjoys outdoor trips in summertime. We like to try out new vegetables and have dinner together every once in a while, enjoy daily conversations at the kitchen table and explore the neighborhood. We both enjoy reading, being outdoors and go for cultural outings. Dorien likes to swim, work on bikes, and to bake sourdough bread. Karolien likes people having over for dinner from time to time, would like to start sewing lessons in January and goes for a run to clear her mind while listening to a podcastWeâ€™re looking for a new cozy housemate, preferable male/x to stay a bit mixed in terms of gender. If you also enjoy living with others, have an interest in and an open view on the world, you are the roommate we are looking for!Please send us an email with a bit about yourself and why you want to live with us. We plan to contact interested people already next week.

name: Dordtselaan
description: Effective immediately we have a spacious 6-room maisonette apartment (approx. 100mÂ²) on the Dordtselaan available for â‚¬1600,- excluding G/W/E per month.The maisonette apartment is located on the 2nd and 3rd floor of the complex. The house has a living room, balcony, 4 (bed) rooms and is in good condition. The kitchen is fully equipped. The apartment has a separate toilet and a bathroom with shower and washbasin.Within walking distance is a metro station, a streetcar station and the historic Maashaven. All major amenities such as, schools, stores, supermarkets, bakeries and public transportation are just steps away.In short, a generous 6-room maisonette apartment available immediately.Details:- Available immediately;- Rent is â‚¬1.600,- per month;- Surface area: 100m2- Rent is excluding gas, water, electricity, internet/tv and municipal taxes;- Income requirement: minimum 2.5 times the monthly rent;- Deposit is equal to 2x the monthly rent;- Registration with the municipality is possible;- Energy label C;- Smoking and pets are not allowed in the house.Are you interested in this neat 6-room maisonette apartment? Please contact us via the contact form on this website and we will schedule a viewing.

name: Willem Buytewechstraat
description: A room (approx. 9 m2 is immediately available for rent, located at Coolhaveneiland in Rotterdam.LocationCentrally located, about 10 minutes from the citycenter, 5 minutes from public transportion and shopping streets like Nieuwe Binnenweg and Schiedamseweg within walking distance.RoomUpholstered and furnished (bed, dresser and wall planks). Lots of light. The room is at the back of the house and is very peaceful. The walls could use some attention. However, itâ€™s a simple but great room for a temporary stay. Kitchen, bathroom and toilet are shared. Living room is private space.Requirementsâ‚¬550,- per month.Immediately available. Maximum rent for 1 month. Extention can be discussed. But registration absolutely not.

name: Franselaan
description: Nice studio in a nice location. 5 minutes from Station Marconiplein. Busstop in front of the door. Not furnished. This studio had a extra energyfee of â‚¬ 75,00 every month till the energycrises is over.

name: Gedempte Zalmhaven
description: Hi there! I am looking for someone interested in staying in the apartment where I live for a short period of time ( from 1st of December to 28th of February .( The Rent is 700 EUR per month) The apartment is located just next to the Erasmus Bridge. The room is about 10 m2, it includes single bed, a small table and a clothing rack.The apartment will be shared with me from Mexico and a girl from Hungary) both working. It has a very spacious living room which has a great view of the Erasmus Bridge. The kitchen has all necessary appliances. All utilities are included. You can also have access to the swimming pool, sauna and gym in the building.Registration is unfortunately not possible.Please send me a message telling a bit about yourself if you are interested.Best,Alejandro

name: Edmond Hellenraadstraat
description: HEERLIJK RUIM 5-KAMER APPARTEMENT MET 2 BALKONS. Fraai gelegen op de vijfde etage (topverdieping!). Deze woning is zeer rustig gelegen, maar met alle voorzieningen binnen handbereik.

name: Polderlaan
description: ### Kamer ###Ruime gestoffeerde kamer voorzien van een televisie- en internetaansluiting (via netwerkkabel en/of Wi-Fi).### Gemeenschappelijk ###De gemeenschappelijke ruimte deel je met 3 anderen* Grote eetkamer met eettafel en stoelen* Moderne keuken met vaatwasser, magnetron, gasfornuis met oven en koelkast met vrieslades* Riante badkamer met douchecabine, wasmachine, badmeubel en toilet* Een tuin en terras* Extra toilet ### Bereikbaarheid ###Uitstekende bereikbaarheid met het openbaar vervoer: tram 20, 23, 2 en bus 66, 77. Deze zijn allemaal op loopafstand. Met de tram ben je in 15 minuten op Beurs/ChurchillpleinEenvoudig naar o.a. Erasmus, Albeda, inHolland, Zadkine of Hogeschool Rotterdam etc.### Omgeving ###De levendige winkelstraat Boulevard Zuid is op loopafstand. Hier vind je o.a. AH, Dirk, Mediamarkt, Etos, KFC, McDonald's, Blokker, Bram Ladage, Subway en nog veel meer winkels en eetgelegenheden. Met de fiets ben je in 7 minuten bij Pathe de Kuip en Fit for Free.### Vragen? Wil je langskomen? ###Lijkt de kamer je wat? Heb je nog vragen? Neem dan gerust contact op en kom geheel vrijblijvend even kijken naar je toekomstige kamer ;-)Groetjes Helga

name: Swiftstraat
description: Kamer per 1 januari 2023 beschikbaar in dit leuke 4 kamer appartement. De woning deel je met 2 jonge mannen, waarvan er 1 momenteel bij zijn vriendin woont en de ander studeert. De woning is modern gemeubileerd en erg compleet. Wasmachine, vaatwasser, stofzuiger etc. zijn allemaal aanwezig. In de kamer is een nieuwe kledingkast aanwezig en de kamer is gestoffeerd. Je hoeft dus alleen je privÃ© spullen te verhuizen. Woning is op loopafstand van station Lombardijen, veel mogelijkheden voor OV en winkels in de buurt. De algemene ruimtes in de woning worden 1 keer per 2 weken schoongemaakt door een schoonmaakster.Let op, alleen beschikbaar voor studenten die ingeschreven zijn aan een erkende instelling. Betreft een campuscontract.

name: Libellenstraat
description: *Dutch-speaking roommate preferred*Hoi!Per 1 januari komt er een kamer vrij in ons huis in hartje Kralingen! Het centrum, universiteit, Kralingse plas en meerdere cafe's zijn te voet of per fiets bereikbaar. We wonen op 5 minuten loopafstand van de AH, een tramhalte, een metrostation, en een Hema.We delen in het huis een woonkamer, keuken, badkamer en twee wc's, die allemaal van alle gemakken zijn voorzien (bad, wasmachine, droger, oven, vaatwasmachine, etc.). Ook hebben we een balkon, waar we zelf een heuse bar hebben gebouwd.De ruimte die bij ons vrijkomt bestaat in feite uit twee kamers van 2 bij 2,2 meter, waarbij het bijvoorbeeld handig is om een bed in de ene kamer te zetten, en een kast en bureau in de andere kamer. Uiteraard heb je daar zelf de volledige regie over. Er is overigens ook een zolder, waar alles wat je niet gebruikt kan worden gestationeerd.Je komt te wonen met een mannelijke huisgenoot van 28 jaar (Marnix) en een vrouwelijke huisgenoot van 25 jaar (Daan). Marnix werkt bij een bank en bij zijn eigen podcast en Daan doet haar Master bij Leiden Universiteit en is een part-time werkstudent bij een bedrijf in Rotterdam. We eten regelmatig samen, willen in het weekend nog wel eens een biertje opentrekken en zijn niet vies van een stevige discussie over wat er maar voorbijkomt.De kale huur voor de kamers is ongeveer 450-500 euro (moet nog defenitief berekend worden). Voor GWL, internet en de wasmachine komt er nog circa 100 euro bij. Wanneer de gasprijzen weer normaliseren zal dat bedrag lager uitvallen. We zijn op zoek naar een mannelijke/vrouwelijke huisgenoot die in zijn/haar master zit of net een paar jaar werkt. Heb jij interesse om bij ons te komen wonen? Laat het weten via een berichtje met daarin kort wie je bent en wat je doet, en dan nodigen we je wellicht uit om een borrel te komen drinken!- English version -Starting January 1, 2023 a room will be free in our house in the middle of Kralingen. We're close to the uni, the center, and Kralingsebos, and plenty of public transport stations/pubs/grocery stores. We share a living room, 1 bathroom, 2 toilets, and a kitchen. There is a washer & dryer in the bathroom.The space that is becoming available on January 1 is 2 rooms of about 2,2 m^2. You can for example fit a queen bed in one of the spaces and make the other your closet/workspace. There's also an attic where you can store any of your extra stuff. You'll be living with Marnix (M, 28) and Daan (V, 25). Marnix has his own podcast and does some freelance work for a bank, and Daan is finishing up her Master's and works as a working student for a company in Rotterdam. We're looking for a roommate who'd like to eat together sometimes, share a beer on our balcony on warm nights, and enjoys hanging out and chilling in our living room once in a while. Rent will be between ~450-500 excl (still being definitively calculated) and GWL/internet/washer/dryer will be an extra ~120eu per month until energy prices level off. Interested? Please send us a message, we'd love to hear from you!

name: Maaskade
description: Room available at a beautiful location with a view onto the river Maas. Recently renovated apartment on the third floor with a spacious shared  living room (50 m2) including "cooking island". ;)Free of charge are the two roommates, both with a full-time job. Now and then we like to eat and drink together, if lucky outside at the waterside on the quay wall. Let me know if you are interested, we can plan in a visit. The room is available from the 19th of December.

name: Doezastraat
description: In ons huis komen twee kamers vrij voor onbepaalde tijd, de eerste (grote kamer) per januari en de tweede (kleine kamer met kantoor) per februari! Waar? Doezastraat in Blijdorp: 5min van station, 10min van de stad, 15min van de uni en Erasmusbrug.Wie? We zoeken iemand die in de eindfase van de studie is of begin werkend, maar die wel nog houdt van wat gezelligheid in huis en het leuk vindt om samen te eten, sporten of borrelen ðŸŒžOns fijne huis heeft een ruime woonkeuken, een gemeenschappelijke woonkamer, twee balkons en twee badkamers. We wonen er in totaal met 5, waarvan er dus twee het huis gaan verlaten. De grote kamer is â‚¬715 en de kleine kamer met kantoor is â‚¬635.Ben jij degene die we zoeken? Stuur mij (Wies) dan even een berichtje waarin je je voorsteltðŸ™‚ Liefs ons (Hente, Romee, Wies)Only Dutch speaking

name: Kerkwervesingel
description: A semi-furnished room is immediately available on the Kerkwervesingel in the beautiful Slinge. This has a rental price of â‚¬450 ex - â‚¬560 incl utilities. A bed with mattress is available.The facilities are shared with a decent female and male tenant. There is also a shared living room.!Free parkingThe viewing is scheduled for next Thursday, December 1 at 7:00 PM. Sign up quickly via a PM!

name: Koggestraat
description: A large room is immediately available at the Koggestraat in Rotterdam-West. This is adjacent to a balcony and has a rental price of â‚¬600 ex - â‚¬710 incl utilities. The facilities are shared with 2 other neat (both male and female) tenants. Registration is possible and the room is suitable for max 1 person.Marconiplein metro station can be reached within a few minutes!!The room is delivered unfurnished.The viewing is scheduled for Thursday 1 December at 20:00. Sign up quickly!

name: Zuidhoek
description: A neat room is immediately available at the Zuidhoek. This is delivered unfurnished and has a rental price of â‚¬550 ex - â‚¬660 incl.The facilities are shared with 2 other neat tenants. Registration is possible. The Maastunnel can be reached within a few minutes.The viewing is scheduled for Thursday December 1 at 6:25 pm. Sign up via a PM.

name: Pleinweg
description: This 2 bedroom, 59 M2 apartment is extensively renovated in '22, located on the 1st floor.The newly renovated kitchen has a 2 m freezer fridge combination, modern flex-zone induction cooking hob, extractor hood, dishwasher, combimicrowave oven, wash basin, Delonghi barista coffeemaker with freshly grinded beans and a Philips airfryer. The kitchen has 10 closets with shelves plus 5 drawers.Complete kitchen utensils set and cutlery for up to 5 persons.The balcony can be entered from the master bedroom or kitchen. The covered balcony provides outdoor sitting even in rainy weather.The master bedroom has 2 box spring beds 90 x 200 cm and can be joined as 1 double bed. The wardrobe is 300 cm wide and 235 cm high with shelves hanging space, drawers and ambiance in-closet lighting. We provide sufficient bedlinen and towels.The second bedroom has a bunkbed size of 195 x 90 cm. The room has a black closet with drawers for clothes.The spacious living room has a dining corner with a granite table and 4 leather chairs, black leather couch for 4 people. The side table is in matching black leather and has a large inside storage space. A 5th bed in the living room can be unfolded from a closet to a comfortable 90 x 200 cm bed.50 inch Philips model 2022 smartTV and high speed internet included.The bathroom is with toilet and shower. Washing machine in a separate corridor closet.Utilities included at estimated â‚¬ 250,00 per month. Extra use will be charged at cost rates.The NeighbourhoodAt the other side of the street is a small shopping mall with some 10 shops. The biggest shopping center of Rotterdam South (Zuidplein) is located at 800 meters from the apartment. There are good public transport connections. The apartment is on 500 meters distance from the Maastunnel, connecting the south with the north part of the city.

name: Heggedoorn
description: A spacious home what will be shared with a fun student on the same floor! The private room is spaciously laid out with a medium-sized wardrobe, comfortable bed, and a functional work desk.The large living room is shared with another student. The kitchen is at the moment also used by the landlords themselves who live on the ground floor. Furthermore, the neighborhood gives a quiet and safe feeling.The location of the house is practical, there are two metro stations accessible on foot, namely Binnenhof and Graskruid. Furthermore, the Binnenhof shopping center is a 10-minute walk away and the Alexandrium shopping center is a 20-minute walk away. There is also a supermarket ''behind'' the house!Want to know more about the house? Plan a viewing or inform yourself via our contact details!

name: Mathenesserlaan
description: Hi student!A temporary room is available in our house in Rotterdam Oud-West. Our place at the Mathenesserlaan is equipped with all comforts, including a nice espresso machine, gametompouce, pub bingo, record player, a spacious shared living room, and a beautiful roof terrace.This room is 13m2, fully furnished and has a view over the lovely petanque court. All-inclusive monthly costs are 560 euros, and the room is available from December. The supermarket, nice parks, and bars are within a couple of minutes of walking distance; the city center and central station are reachable in 10 minutes by bike.Are you interested in living with 6 really nice (male) roommates (student or working)? Send us a reaction! Reserve some time on November 28/30th to come by and meet us. There will be more dates when we could meet.The room will be available for 3 months, probably up to and including February. Maybe longer but this is up for discussion with the roommate renting out the room!Send me a dm if you'reÂ interested!

name: Beverstraat
description: Completely renovated apartment in Rotterdam South with completely new bathroom, open kitchen and beautiful spacious terrace with pine floorboards. New laminate flooring available throughout the house. Close to public transport, shops and parks. The appartment has no furniture.
